The statement made by Sen: Patty Murray regarding the increase in state legislatures passing restrictive legislation on abortion in the past three years compared to the previous 10 years.
Data compiled by the Guttmacher Institut: a nonprofit that promotes reproductive health and abortion rights, which tracked and outlined the differences in abortion restrictions by year.
The specific categories of abortion rest: including abortion bans, regulations on abortion providers, abortion medication, and private insurance coverage for abortion.
The varying perspectives and methodologi: rights groups in counting and reporting the exact number of abortion restrictions.
